verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is my <S%H216>light<s%> and my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%> Whom shall I <S%H3372>fear?<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H2416>life.<s%> Of whom shall I be <S%H6342>afraid?<s%>

When <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> at me to eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> even my <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> and my <S%H341>foes,<s%> they <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fell.<s%>

Though an <S%H4264>army<s%> should <S%H2583>encamp<s%> against <S%H3820>me,<s%> my heart shall not <S%H3372>fear.<s%> Though <S%H4421>war<s%> should <S%H6965>rise<s%> against <S%H982>me,<s%> even then I will be confident.

<S%H259>One<s%> thing I have <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3427>after,<s%> that I may dwell in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life,<s%> to <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5278>beauty,<s%> and to <S%H1239>inquire<s%> in his <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

For in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> he will keep me <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in his <S%H5520>pavilion.<s%> In the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> he will <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H7311>me.<s%> He will lift me up on a <S%H6697>rock.<s%>

Now my <S%H7218>head<s%> will be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H2076>me.<s%> I will offer <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8643>joy<s%> in his <S%H168>tent.<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing,<s%> <S%H2167>yes,<s%> I will sing praises to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I <S%H7121>cry<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice.<s%> Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> also on <S%H6030>me,<s%> and answer me.
When you <S%H1245>said,<s%> "Seek my <S%H6440>face,<s%>" my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1245>you,<s%> "I will seek your <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H5641>Don't<s%> hide your <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H5186>me.<s%> Don't put your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5186>away<s%> in <S%H639>anger.<s%> You have been my <S%H5833>help.<s%> <S%H5203>Don't<s%> abandon <S%H5800>me,<s%> neither forsake <S%H430>me,<s%> God of my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>
When my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> then Yahweh will take me <S%H622>up.<s%>
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me your <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H5148>Lead<s%> me in a <S%H4334>straight<s%> <S%H734>path,<s%> because of my <S%H8324>enemies.<s%>

<S%H5414>Don't<s%> deliver me over to the <S%H5315>desire<s%> of my <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> for <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> have risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H3307>me,<s%> such as breathe out <S%H2555>cruelty.<s%>
I am <S%H3884>still<s%> <S%H539>confident<s%> of <S%H7200>this:<s%> I will see the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
<S%H6960>Wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Be <S%H553>strong,<s%> and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> take <S%H2388>courage.<s%> <S%H6960>Yes,<s%> wait for <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
